name: Episodes
text:
Episodes
There are a total of 48 episodes of Twin Peaks, counting the original ABC series (1990-91) and the Showtime limited event series (2017).

Notes
↑ 1.0 1.1 The episode titles used on Netflix and elsewhere are translations of the titles given to each episode when the series aired in Germany. In addition, "Episode 28," which only aired along with the series finale, was retroactively titled "Miss Twin Peaks" by some sources.
↑ Original German: Spuren ins Nichts → Traces to nowhere
↑ Original German: ZEN - oder die Kunst, einen Moerder zu fassen → Zen and the art of killer-catching
↑ Original German: Ruhe in Unfrieden → Rest in pain
↑ Original German: Der Einarmige → The one-armed man
↑ Original German: Cooper's Traeume → Cooper's dreams
↑ Original German: Zeit des Erkennens → Realization time
↑ Original German: Der letzte Abend → The last evening
↑ Original German: Der Riese sei mit Dir → May the giant be with you
↑ Original German: Koma → Coma
↑ Original German: Der Mann hinter Glas → The man behind glass
↑ Original German: Laura's geheimes Tagebuch → Laura's secret diary
↑ Original German: Der Fluch der Orchideen → The orchid's curse
↑ Original German: Daemonen → Demons
↑ Original German: Einsame Seelen → Lonely souls
↑ Original German: Spazierfahrt mit einer Toten → Drive with a dead girl
↑ Original German: Selbstjustiz → Arbitrary law
↑ Original German: Bruderzwist → Dispute between brothers
↑ Original German: Maskenball → Masked ball
↑ Original German: Die schwarze Witwe → The black widow
↑ Original German: Schachmatt → Checkmate
↑ Original German: Doppelspiel → Doubleplay
↑ Original German: Sklaven und Meister → Slaves and masters
↑ Original German: Die Verdammte → The condemned woman
↑ Original German: Wunden und Narben → Wounds and scars
↑ Original German: Auf den Schwingen der Liebe → On the wings of love
↑ Original German: Beziehungsvariationen → Variations on relations
↑ Original German: Der Weg zur schwarzen Huette → The path to the Black Lodge
↑ Original German: Die Nacht der Entscheidung → The night of decision
↑ Original German: Jenseits von Leben und Tod → Beyond life and death
↑ The Twin Peaks: A Limited Event Series releases appear to use the episode quotes as subtitles; i.e. "Part 1: My Log Has a Message for You"
